resources.string: 1. Connect to ELM327 device using Bluetooth button at the top-right corner. 2. Press Read CVT DTC. 3. Result interpretation: 57 00 - no error codes; 57 03 - 3 error codes, individual codes will follow delimited by 40. 4. Sample: 57 04 07 25 40 D0 00 40 17 22 40 08 26 40 00 00 00 00 00 00 means 4 errors: 0725, D000, 1722, 0826 (D000 means U1000). 5. To clear DTC, send 14FF00 very quickly after reading DTC. 03 54 FF 00 returned if DCT successfully cleared.
